resolution.description: The described issue is not actually a problem - it is as designed.
resolution.name: Not A Problem

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

fields.description:
This has started appearing on Travis, e.g.:
https://travis-ci.org/apache/arrow/jobs/596181386#L3663
{code}
In file included from /home/travis/build/apache/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/util/logging.cc:29:0:

/home/travis/build/apache/arrow/pyarrow-test-3.6/include/glog/logging.h:994:0: error: "DCHECK" redefined [-Werror]

 #define DCHECK(condition) CHECK(condition)

 

In file included from /home/travis/build/apache/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/util/logging.cc:18:0:

/home/travis/build/apache/arrow/cpp/src/arrow/util/logging.h:130:0: note: this is the location of the previous definition

 #define DCHECK ARROW_CHECK

 {code}

comments.body: It was a problem with conda-forge compilers, fixed in https://github.com/conda-forge/ctng-compiler-activation-feedstock/pull/3
